br.octahedron.cotopaxi.config
Interface CotopaxiConfigView

All Known Implementing Classes:
CotopaxiConfigViewImpl
public interface CotopaxiConfigView

A view for all Cotopaxi's configuration parameters.

Author:
Danilo Penna Queiroz - daniloqueiroz@octahedron.com.br
